name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
ingredients: 1 cup sour cream 1 cup artichokes chopped
1 cup mayonaise 1 1/2 -­‐ 2 cups grated mozzarella cheese
1 bunch spinach, blanched, drained and chopped 1/2 -­‐ 1 cup Romano cheese, Parmesan cheese or Sargento
1/2 c. water chestnuts, drained and chopped
steps: Spread in a pie plate. Bake at 350 until lightly brown around the edges.
